enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve creating collections, which could be used to set up the map state for testing totalSize.
The put method adds values to the map, which is necessary to set up the map state for testing totalSize.
The values method provides access to the collections of values, which is directly used in the totalSize method to calculate the total size.
The getCollection method retrieves the collection of values for a key, which is indirectly used in the totalSize method to calculate the total size.
